Name: Get-AppLockerFileInformation
Synopsis: Gets the file information necessary to create AppLocker rules from a list of files or an event log.

Name: Get-AppLockerPolicy
Synopsis: Gets the local, the effective, or a domain AppLocker policy.

Name: New-AppLockerPolicy
Synopsis: Creates a new AppLocker policy from a list of file information and other rule creation options.

Name: Set-AppLockerPolicy
Synopsis: Sets the AppLocker policy for the specified GPO.

Name: Test-AppLockerPolicy
Synopsis: Specifies the AppLocker policy to determine whether the input files will be allowed to run for a given user.
